remote.title: wmpq.supplier.id
remote.hql: SELECT sup.id, sup.name, sup.code FROM WmsSupplier sup where 1=1 AND (sup.name LIKE :param or sup.code like :param)

remote.title: wmpq.item.id
remote.displayedTableHead: 序号,物料描述,物料编码
remote.hql: SELECT item.id, item.name, item.code FROM WmsItem item ,WmsCompany company LEFT JOIN item.masterGroup masterGroup LEFT JOIN item.lotRule lotRule LEFT JOIN item.countLotRule countLotRule WHERE 1=1 AND company.masterGroup.id=item.masterGroup.id AND company.type='N' AND company.id in (select wareCompany.company.id from WmsWarehouseCompany wareCompany where wareCompany.warehouse.baseOrganization.id=#{SESSION_BASE_ORGAN}) AND (item.name LIKE :param or item.code LIKE :param)
